00035 MetadataRoot::MetadataRoot(SchemaPtr &schema) : m_next(0) {
00036   HandleCallbackPtr null_callback;
00037 
00038   foreach(const Schema::AccessGroup *ag, schema->get_access_groups())
00039     m_agnames.push_back(ag->name);
00040 
00041   try {
00042     m_handle = Global::hyperspace->open("/hypertable/root", OPEN_FLAG_READ,
00043                                             null_callback);
00044   }
00045   catch (Exception &e) {
00046     HT_ERRORF("Problem opening Hyperspace root file '/hypertable/root' - %s - "
00047               "%s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00048     HT_ABORT;
00049   }
00050 
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 MetadataRoot::~MetadataRoot() {
00055   try {
00056     Global::hyperspace->close(m_handle);
00057   }
00058   catch (Exception &e) {
00059     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00060   }
00061 }

00063 
00064 void MetadataRoot::reset_files_scan() {
00065   m_next = 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 bool MetadataRoot::get_next_files(String &ag_name, String &files) {
00070 
00071   while (m_next < m_agnames.size()) {
00072     DynamicBuffer value(0);
00073     String attrname = (String)"files." + m_agnames[m_next];
00074     ag_name = m_agnames[m_next];
00075     m_next++;
00076 
00077     try {
00078       Global::hyperspace->attr_get(m_handle, attrname.c_str(), value);
00079     }
00080     catch (Exception &e) {
00081       if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND)
00082         continue;
00083       HT_ERRORF("Problem getting attribute '%s' on Hyperspace file "
00084                 "'/hypertable/root' - %s", attrname.c_str(),
00085                 Error::get_text(e.code()));
00086       return false;
00087     }
00088     files = (const char *)value.base;
00089     return true;
00090   }
00091 
00092   return false;
00093 }
00094 
00095 
00096 void MetadataRoot::write_files(const String &ag_name, const String &files) {
00097   String attrname = (String)"files." + ag_name;
00098 
00099   try {
00100     Global::hyperspace->attr_set(m_handle, attrname.c_str(), files.c_str(),
00101                                  files.length());
00102   }
00103   catch (Exception &e) {
00104     HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, (String)"Problem creating attribute '" + attrname
00105               + "' on Hyperspace file '/hypertable/root'");
00106   }
00107 }
